message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this is a competitive price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $10,500? It's a fantastic deal for a product of this quality.

I understand your position, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $9,800? I'm really interested in the product and I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget constraints.
